Class HomeBudget

Represents the HomeBudget, including a list of Categories and a list of Expenses.

System.String databaseFile

The database file.
System.Boolean isNewDB

Indicates whether to create a new database (with default data) or to open an existing database.
System.Boolean defaultCats

Indicates whether to create default categories or not.
